name: Contents Meals
description: National low salt cooking challenge 2021 was held in Sri Lanka organized by the
ingredients: meal they were requested to prepare a low salt-preserved food which
complements the main meal. There were 20 teams selected from the first round
description_sinhala: විසින් සංවිධානය කරන ලද ජාතික අඩු ලුණු ඉවුම් පිහුම් අභියෝගය 2021 ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේදී පැවැත්විණි
description_tamil: தேசிய குறைந்த உப்பு சமையல் சவால் 2021 இலங்கையில் ஏற்பாடு செய்யப்பட்டது
cultural_notes_sinhala: ඉවුම් පිහුම් පොතෙන් උපුටා ගන්නා ලදී
